DOC.brief_summary: This study prospective Cohort study perform multicenter ( General Hospital ) Korea . Inclusion criteria patient atrial fibrillation visit hospital . The purpose analyze complication , composite outcome ( cause mortality , hospitalization , incidence stroke , heart failure cardiovascular event ( MACE ) ) accord 1 ) use anti-arrhythmic drug ( AADs ) , 2 ) use medication rate control ( beta blocker , calcium channel blocker digoxin ) 3 ) use anticoagulation agent ( warfarin , coumadin , NOAC )
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Study Drugs Symptom Control Complication Prevention Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) ( Code-AF Trial )
DOC.criteria: patient atrial fibrillation patient age 19 patient agree study inclusion patient agree study inclusion patient age le 19 Pregnancy , Breastfeeding
